# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to exceed expectations. This product comes with a wealth of features designed to enhance your experience and bring value to your life. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than $100. Would you be interested in acquiring this product at a special introductory price of $120? I'm confident it will meet and surpass your expectations. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
